messages.title: Theresa May backs Adam Sykes
messages.content: Adam Sykes is standing with me to secure strong and stable leadership for our country, and the best Brexit deal possible for you and your constituency of Wirral South. Adam Sykes will be a strong voice for our community in a Government that can join up with you, local interests and togetherness to improve our future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jobs and industries in Wirral rely on the local sector in the Brexit negotiations, and we will make sure we get the best deal to drive success in our area.

Here in the North West, there are 1429 more hospital doctors and 2925 more hospital nurses since 2010. The City Region Deal promises 1 out of the 1000 new adult mental health staff and Wirral NHS receives an extra £20 billion real term investment by 2020.
Our local environment is one of the most important things about our area, and I will work with the Council to increase development of brownfields first.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Raise Standards For Children In School
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As a former student at Calday Grammar School, I am a big believer in giving a wide choice of schools to parents and pupils.
Since 2010, retired teachers, police, nurses and more have seen a 5.7% increase in the pensions, and we will continue to support our local retired residents.

issues.brexitEurope: The best Brexit deal possible for you and your constituency of Wirral South.
issues.education: As a former student at Calday Grammar School, I am a big believer in giving a wide choice of schools to parents and pupils.
issues.environment: Our local environment is one of the most important things about our area, and I will work with the Council to increase development of brownfields first.
issues.health: Here in the North West, there are 1429 more hospital doctors and 2925 more hospital nurses since 2010. The City Region Deal promises 1 out of the 1000 new adult mental health staff and Wirral NHS receives an extra £20 billion real term investment by 2020.
issues.socialWelfare: Since 2010, retired teachers, police, nurses and more have seen a 5.7% increase in the pensions, and we will continue to support our local retired residents.

housing.content: Our local environment is one of the most important things about our area, and I will work with the Council to increase development of brownfields first.

endorsements.endorser: Margaret, Heswall resident and charity volunteer
endorsements.endorsement: I’ve known Adam since he was a boy growing up in Heswall. He’s worked hard to use his own business to help people build careers, and he’s passionate about making Heswall, and Wirral, an even better place to live and raise a family.

endorsements.endorser: Allan, Thornton Hough resident and Green Belt campaigner
endorsements.endorsement: Adam is one of the best candidates I have ever had in Thornton Hough. He listens to people and is ready to use his Government role – his emails to me – working with our Conservative Town Hall’s failure to save the Green Belt and its precious places.

endorsements.endorser: Chris, Gayton resident and former Labour voter
endorsements.endorsement: Like many others, I’ve voted Labour all my life. But I’m not supporting the Conservatives that are making our lives better. I support Adam and Theresa May to get the best deal possible for making Wirral South, Wirral and the whole Mersey good MP for Wirral South.

leaflet.additionalNotes: For an active, strong and hardworking MP, who will stand up for Wirral South, vote Adam Sykes on 8th June.
